name: Bassing Beat 2
overview: Miracle Jim no - Bassing Beat 2 is the sequel to Bassing Beat and is also a 3d fishing game. The game features 3 different anglers: Hajime Murata, a man and a woman. The game now got a new rythmn system to reel that makes the gameplay harder than in the first game. Game Modes: - Free Fishing: Choose a fishing point and start fishing. - Bass Master Course: Miracle - Shop: Here the player can buy new rods, lures and watch the different records. The game features also a tutorial mode to explain the basics of the game.
